item.title: Mumbai Film Festival Goes on Hiatus for a Year
item.description: India’s popular Mumbai Film Festival, operated by the Mumbai Academy of Moving Image (MAMI), will not have a 2025 edition. In an announcement posted to X on Monday, festival director Shivendra S
